summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case. The email was sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address on July 29, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.

events.title: Voice message forwarded to Epstein victims contact
events.description: A voice message was forwarded via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment related to the Epstein case.
The email was sent on July 29, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
The recipient was the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov).
The email originated from the DOJ's voicemail system (postmaster@voip.usa.doj.gov).
The attachment likely contains a voice message from a victim, witness, or informant related to the Epstein investigation.
